name: Magic League - Castle Wars Pro
description:
* Get ready for magic clash - the real-time fast-paced strategy card game! *
** Collect spells, create your perfect deck, summon creatures and lead your heroes to the victory **
*** Evil forces have broken this world in two parts…Only YOU can decide who will rule the world… ***

Magic League is the real-time breathtaking fightings with other players. It is the great collection of spells. It is your own way to the top of the rating. Collect and upgrade the spells to grasp the whole great might of the magic and become the best of the best!

* DOZENS OF POWERFUL SPELLS *
Dark Army, Gift of Nature, Fireball, Summon Golem and many others.
Freeze, burn, poison, explode your enemies!

* WIZARDS AND MONSTERS *
The great variety of different units types with unique abilities and weaknesses.
Use all your resources to fight with the army of monsters.

* UPGRADES AND CUSTOMIZATION *
Get more powerful spells of DAMAGE & HEALING, improved castles and new cards;

Feel the heat of tower defense that has it all:
• Deadly SPELLS;
• Mighty CASTLES;
• Clans of powerful WIZARDS and MONSTERS from your worst dreams.

Magic League – make this battle your BEST or your LAST.
